RM Dec 2021 - This sheet is for the Swedish RPG [The Troubleshooters](https://helmgast.se/en/troubleshooters/) (2021) published by Helmgast. The coat of arms image from the passport cover and The Troubleshooters name and logo are (c) Helmgast and are used here with their kind permission. 
 - When learning languages or developing attributes, use the checkboxes to record experience spent. 
 - Condition descriptions are revealed by hovering over the name. 
 When adding weapons on the Combat sheet, selecting the applicable skill will reveal the relevant roll buttons + a 'Reload' field if a ranged weapon - if appropriate replace the '99' with the lower bound of the tag. 
 Checkboxes next to languages, abilities, etc. represent points spent to learn. 
 This sheet can be edited and improved as long as the copyright statement is retained/updated for any relevant imagery or other content used.
